title: Apple TV+ wins its first BAFTA TV Awards for these two documentaries
content:
Apple has won its first BAFTA TV Awards for its documentaries, 9/11: Inside the President’s War Room and 1971: The Year That Music Changed Everything. Each year the BAFTAs honor the best British programs and productions with its latest ceremony on Sunday.

more…

The post Apple TV+ wins its first BAFTA TV Awards for these two documentaries appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple won its first BAFTA TV Awards for “9/11: Inside the President’s War Room” and “1971: The Year Music Changed Everything."
